title: Facts about film (1959)
creator_credit: Robert Longini and Visual Education Films
brief_description: Indicates the proper use of film and projectors, how to maintain and repair film, and what causes film damage. Deals with such matters as threading of film in projector, splicing and the ways in which film may be scratched.
description: Indicates the proper use of film and projectors, how to maintain and repair film, and what causes film damage. Deals with such matters as threading of film in projector, splicing and the ways in which film may be scratched.
